translation.en: [girl] Hi. Or should that be: [in British accent] How do you do?
translation.ko: 안녕? 아니면 처음 만나서 반갑다고 해야 하나?

translation.en: [chuckles] [in normal voice] I'm Zoe. I'm 15 and--
Uh, guys? Guys? Wrong girl.
I'm the out-of-place American over here,
and this is England.
Beautiful, isn't it?
This place smells of cow.
[Zoe] Yeah, now you come to mention it, there's a definite aroma.
translation.ko: 동생이 언급했으니 말인데 확실히 무슨 냄새가 나긴 해

translation.en: That's my little sister, Rosie.
She's more LA than a wannabe actor sipping on kale juice.
translation.ko: 케일 주스를 마시는 배우 지망생보다 더 LA에 어울리지

translation.en: We've been walking for days.
Are we lost?
I know these roads like the back of my hand. I'm not lost.
translation.ko: 난 이곳을 속속들이 알아 길 잃은 거 아니야

translation.en: [Zoe] That's my mom. She's totally lost, in more ways than one.
translation.ko: 이분은 우리 엄마야 여러 면에서 헤매고 계시지

translation.en: -Ooh, look at that. -[bird squawking]
Is that a buzzard?
[Zoe] And that, my friends, is a really big horse.
-Excuse me. -[Rosie gasps]
[Zoe] Sorry. Hope my sister didn't get in the way of your massive horse.
translation.ko: 미안, 내 동생이 네 커다란 말을 방해한 게 아니었으면 좋겠네!

translation.en: My party shoes.
Did someone say party?
-Gramps! -[Frank] Zoe!
But how wonderful to see you!
Ah. I thought you were going to camp. Where's your dad?
translation.ko: 여름 캠프에 갈 줄 알았는데 네 아빠는?

translation.en: Long story.
Dad, you're not supposed to be driving.
I'm not supposed to be driving a car.
This isn't a car.
-Now, who wants a lift to the house? -[Rosie] Me.
Get on the back there. Right, that's it.
Welcome home.
[Rosie] Hit the gas, Gramps.
[Maggie] Don't encourage him.
Dad, slow down!
[Zoe] Things in LA got kind of complicated kind of quickly.
And I figure a summer vacay
on a tiny island off the coast of England is just what I need.
translation.ko: 여름 방학을 보내는 게 지금 내게 필요한 일 같아

translation.en: Zero parental stress, zero weirdly possessive friends
translation.ko: 부모님께 받는 스트레스나 소유욕 강한 친구도 없고

translation.en: -and absolutely zero drama. -[tires squealing]
translation.ko: 감정이 널뛸 극적인 사건도 없을 테니까

translation.en: [Rosie] Gramps, watch out!
[Rosie] It's okay, I'm fine.
Hmm, I'll get back to you about that whole zero drama thing.
translation.ko: 극적인 사건에 대해선 나중에 다시 얘기하자

translation.en: ♪ No matter what you're doin' ♪ ♪ No matter what you're playin' ♪
[Frank] Come in, come in, come in, come in.
Yeah, yeah. Put it down.
It's all exactly the same.
[Frank] This is new.
-What do you think? -That is very British.
So, what happened to Huck?
-Oh, Dad's working. -Yeah, really hard. [chuckles]
-It's all good, though. I have his ticket. -You'd really rather spend the summer
translation.ko: - 대신 제가 왔잖아요 - 여름을 친구들이 아니라

translation.en: with your old grandpa than your friends?
Yeah. They'll be there when I get back.
Probably.
Mmm. Smells good, Gramps. What are you cooking?
-Rabbit. -Mom, Grandpa's cooking Peter Rabbit.
-Couldn't you have done egg and chips? -She should know what real food is.
translation.ko: 계란프라이랑 감자튀김 하실 순 없었어요? 로지도 진짜 음식이 뭔지 알아야지

translation.en: I suppose it's all rehydrated tofu burgers in LA.
Are you really going there already?
[Frank] I'm just saying, it'll be good for them to spend time somewhere real.
translation.ko: 애들이 진실한 곳에서 시간을 보내는 게 좋겠단 거다

translation.en: Somewhere with a bit of soul.
-[Maggie] LA has soul, too. -Oh. [Maggie] If you'd get on a plane, I could show you.
translation.ko: LA에도 영혼이 있어요 아빠도 가면 알게 될 거예요

translation.en: -[Frank] The last thing I need is LA. -Perfect.
[Frank] I'm doing fine.
[Zoe] "Dear Maggie. The light will come through again. Love, Mama."
translation.ko: '매기에게 해가 다시 비칠 거야' '사랑을 담아, 엄마가'

translation.en: Cryptic. I like it.
[Rosie] Mom, why isn't the Wi-Fi working?
-[Frank] What's a Wi-Fi? -[Rosie] Mom!
That's it. That's it. I'm calling the embassy.
Wi-Fi is a basic human right.
[Zoe] This is what I wanted, what I needed.
translation.ko: 바로 이게 내가 원하고 내게 필요했던 거야

translation.en: Just peace and quiet and...
Hello, jet lag.
[Maggie] Zoe!
-Rosie's missing. -[sighs]
-[Maggie] I've looked everywhere. -She's probably gone-- ugh! For a walk.
translation.ko: - 전부 찾아봤는데 없어 - 아마 산책하러 갔을 거야

translation.en: -Rosie doesn't do walks. -[Maggie] She doesn't know these roads.
translation.ko: - 로지는 걷는 거 싫어해요 - 로지는 이곳 길도 모르고

translation.en: -She doesn't know the dangers. -We're getting a little hysterical.
translation.ko: - 어떤 위험이 있는지 몰라 - 과민반응 같구나

translation.en: -She's only been gone five minutes. -Grandpa, please, not helping.
translation.ko: - 겨우 5분 안 보인 거야 - 할아버지, 도움 안 돼요

translation.en: Mom, relax, breathe. [inhales]
Remember your Yogalates. [exhales]
Right, yes. My breathing. Uh...
I'll go wait by the phone.
I'll find her. She couldn't have gone far.
translation.ko: 제가 찾아볼게요 멀리는 안 갔을 거예요

translation.en: -Is your mother always this... -Recently, yes.
You're not really here to nurse your invalid grandfather, are you?
translation.ko: 아픈 할아버지 돌보러 여기 온 거 아니구나?

translation.en: -No, Grandpa. -Thank goodness for that.
-I gotta go find Rosie. -Yeah.
Rosie!
[Zoe] This place is so beautiful.
It needs a coffee shop right there, but other than that, all good.
translation.ko: 저쪽에 카페가 있으면 좋겠지만 그것 빼고는 전부 맘에 들어

translation.en: Ow. Excuse me, hi.
Hey, um, I don't suppose you've seen a ten-year-old girl about yea high,
translation.ko: 10살짜리 여자애를 찾고 있어 키는 이 정도인데

translation.en: resembles an angry ball of glitter?
-You're American. -Oh, no, no, no, I'm French.
Really?
[Zoe] Is she serious?
I've never met a French person before.
Bonjour, stranger.
[Zoe] Oh, she's serious.
Okay, so, you haven't seen her?
Just because she's my little sister and she's on the loose.
No, but we'll keep an eye out.
-Okay, all right. Thank you. Thank you. -Wait, wait, wait. Um...
What are you-- Why-- Um--
Translation: Who are you and what are you doing here?
translation.ko: 통역하자면 넌 누구고 여기서 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm Zoe.
I'm staying here for the summer at my gramps' house, over there.
translation.ko: 저쪽에 있는 할아버지 집에서 여름을 보내려고 왔어

translation.en: That's right by the stables. You should totally come and hang out.
You know, I'm not exactly what you'd call outdoorsy.
translation.ko: 난 사실 밖에서 노는 걸 별로 안 좋아하거든

translation.en: It's not all outdoorsy. Some of it's indoorsy.
translation.ko: 전부 밖에서 하는 건 아니고 안에서 하는 활동도 있어

translation.en: Yeah, it's pony camp soon.
Which is gonna be horsesome.
Horsesome's my word.
-It's a combination of horse and awesome. -Got it.
[woman] Girls!
Raven's escaped.
-What? -I want everyone back in the yard now.
-He's been stolen. He must have been. -You don't know that.
The security in this place is utterly inadequate.
-I'm gonna call the police -Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
translation.ko: 이곳 보안이 엉망이군 경찰에 전화해야겠어 너무 앞서가지 말아요

translation.en: -I'll drive around, see if I can find him. -[Zoe] Am I in a Jane Austen novel?
translation.ko: - 제가 차로 찾아볼게요 - 제인 오스틴 소설 속인가?

translation.en: Have I gone back in time?
-What is this place? -[Sam] Marcus.
[Zoe] You've got to be kidding me.
No one looks like that in real life.
-Did I say that out loud? -Huh?
Let's hope Raven comes quietly.
Who's Raven?
-He's-- -Just a horse.
-[Becky] A scary horse. -I'm really worried, Daddy.
translation.ko: - 말이야 - 무서운 말이지 정말 걱정돼요, 아빠 레이븐은 통제 불능이라고요

translation.en: He's totally out of control.
translation.ko: 정말 걱정돼요, 아빠 레이븐은 통제 불능이라고요

translation.en: I'm sure your sister will be fine.
-Can I borrow this? -[Becky] Of course.
Uh, that's my bike.
Be careful.
That girl is the definition of horsesome.
It'll catch on, Jade. Just you wait.
[Zoe] Okay, detective mode engaged.
Where would a very small, very angry little sister hide?
translation.ko: 작고 화난 꼬맹이가 숨을 만한 곳이 어디지?

translation.en: Okay, let's see.
Pier, picturesque.
But no Rosie.
Woods, whole lot of trees.
No Rosie.
Rosie!
Rosie!
Rosie!
Rosie!
Oh, God, no.
Oh, no.
Oh, no, please don't hurt her.
translation.ko: 저 애를 다치게 하면 안 되는데

translation.en: -That's the girl looking for her sister. -Rope and sedatives now, Marcus.
translation.ko: - 동생을 찾던 애잖아요 - 당장 밧줄과 진정제 챙겨

translation.en: Just stay very still!
[Zoe] No, no, no. Okay.
You must be Raven. Okay.
It's okay, it's okay.
It's okay.
Okay, okay, okay. Relax, relax.
It's all okay.
It's okay.
Wait, wait, wait. Look.
I've never seen him so calm.
translation.ko: 레이븐이 저렇게 차분한 건 처음 봐

translation.en: Rough day, huh?
Yeah. Yeah.
Just stay very still.
-[whinnies] -Hey, hey, no, no.
Stop it, don't be like that. Your friends are here to take you home.
translation.ko: 그러면 안 돼, 친구들이 널 집에 데려다주러 왔잖아

translation.en: -[whinnies] -Whoa, whoa. Hey, hey, hey,
Britain's Next Top Model... I don't think he likes that pointy thing.
translation.ko: 잠깐만 '영국 차세대 모델 오빠' 얘가 주사를 싫어하는 것 같아

translation.en: -Easy, Miss America. It's just a sedative. -We just need to get him under control.
translation.ko: 진정해, '미스 아메리카' 그냥 진정제야 진정시켜야 하거든

translation.en: He was under control.
No needles. No sedatives. Just back off.
I said, back off.
Okay, I get it, I get it. You like to be free. I get it.
translation.ko: 알았어, 이해해 넌 자유로운 게 좋구나

translation.en: What's your name?
-Zoe. -[Sam] Okay, Zoe. Raven seems to really like you.
Could you help us get him back to the stables?
translation.ko: 마구간으로 돌려보낼 수 있게 좀 도와줄래?

translation.en: Uh, look, I would love to help you with your scary horse,
translation.ko: 이 무서운 말을 돌려보내는 걸 정말 도와드리고 싶은데

translation.en: I really would, but I need to find my sister.
translation.ko: 이 무서운 말을 돌려보내는 걸 정말 도와드리고 싶은데 전 제 동생을 찾아야 해요

translation.en: Thing is, it's kind of you or the sedative.
translation.ko: 네가 안 도와주면 진정제를 써야 해

translation.en: Listen. If you help us out, we'll help you find your sister.
translation.ko: 우릴 도와주면 우리가 동생 찾는 거 도와줄게

translation.en: -Okay, what do you want me to do? -We need to get this rope clipped on him.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 하면 돼요? - 이 줄을 말에게 고정해줘

translation.en: Okay, okay.
Hey. Okay.
Oh, hey, hey. Shh, shh. Come here.
That's great. We need you to walk him back to the stables,
and we'll be right behind you. If he does anything, we are right there.
Okay, okay. All right.
Okay.
Shh. It's okay, it's okay.
Couple of horse thefts on the mainland. It could be related.
translation.ko: 본토에서 일어난 말 절도와 관련이 있을지도 몰라요

translation.en: [Mia] Horse thieves?
-I knew it. -He only said it could be.
translation.ko: - 이럴 줄 알았어 - 가능성을 얘기한 거야

translation.en: It must have been a gang.
It'd take at least four men, four big men, to control that horse. He's utterly wild.
translation.ko: 거친 말이라 통제하는 데 덩치 큰 사람 넷은 필요해요

translation.en: [Mia] Daddy.
[Becky] This is so going on my blog.
Thank you so much, Zoe. We've got it from here.
[Marcus] Ted, can you give me a hand?
[Ted] Steady, boy.
Steady, boy.
[Sam] Take him to the stables and get him checked over.
[Zoe] See you soon... I guess.
[Sam] Okay, everyone, show's over. Let's get back to work.
-It was a false alarm, Officer. -It's Derek.
-[Sam] I'm so sorry to waste your time. -No time wasted.
translation.ko: - 시간 낭비하셔서 어떡해요 - 시간 낭비 아닙니다

translation.en: It's always good to see you. I mean, to see the yard.
translation.ko: 샘을 보는 건 항상 좋죠 아니, 이곳 말이에요

translation.en: Although I'd advise a review of your alarms and CCTV.
We'll look into it.
Yes, you will.
How's my favorite horse whisperer?
I'm okay. I just need to find my sister.
Right, of course.
Girls.
Wait, wait, wait.
These are Rosie's.
She's not out there. She's in here. Somewhere.
translation.ko: 다른 곳이 아니라 이곳 어딘가에 있나 봐요

translation.en: [Zoe] Seriously, I'm like some kind of wilderness tracker, right?
translation.ko: 내가 야생동물 찾는 일을 하면 정말 잘할 것 같지 않아?

translation.en: We'll help you look. We know all the best hiding places here.
translation.ko: 우리가 도와줄게 숨기 좋은 곳들을 잘 알거든

translation.en: -Thanks, girls. -We were playing hide-and-seek once,
and I got stuck in a Portaloo.
-I thought she'd gone home. -I was in there for six hours.
translation.ko: - 집에 간 줄 알았어 - 거기서 6시간이나 있었지

translation.en: I got the best photo of you and Raven. Totally posting it.
translation.ko: 너랑 레이븐의 멋진 모습을 찍었어 블로그에 올릴 거야

translation.en: "Mysterious Frenchwoman hypnotizes crazy horse."
translation.ko: '신비한 프랑스 여인이 거친 말에 최면을 걸다'

translation.en: I didn't hypnotize him.
[Jade] And she's not French.
-[Becky] It's still huge. -[Jade] Rosie?
Raven's the wildest horse in the yard.
What's his problem?
No one knows for sure.
He never lets anyone close enough to find out.
[Jade] Rosie?
Apart from you.
Maybe he's your destiny.
-[Jade] Rosie, are you in here? -Maybe.
Rosie, are you--?
Hey, boy.
This really isn't a very good hiding place.
-Raven's in here, for starters. -It's okay. It's okay, it's just me.
We should probably go.
-Careful. -It's okay.
So, I'm looking for my little sister.
She's a runaway, like you.
Here. See if he wants one of these.
Ah, so, that's how you brought Raven home.
translation.ko: 그렇게 레이븐을 데려왔구나 사탕으로 뇌물을 준 거야

translation.en: -You bribed him with sweets. -Told you it'd be something like that.
translation.ko: 그렇게 레이븐을 데려왔구나 사탕으로 뇌물을 준 거야 내가 뭐랬어

translation.en: I mean, it is pretty impressive.
You know, you are the talk of the yard.
-[chuckles] I am? -I'm Mia.
-I hope these two aren't bothering you. -No, no, they're cool.
translation.ko: - 이 애들이 귀찮게 했어? - 아냐, 좋은 애들이야

translation.en: We were helping her look for her sister.
translation.ko: 조이가 동생 찾는 거 도와주고 있었어

translation.en: -I suppose you think Raven's eaten her. -Of course not. [chuckles]
-Have you? -[Mia] Run along. I can take things from here.
translation.ko: - 안 잡아먹었지? - 너흰 빠져, 내가 처리할게

translation.en: My dad practically owns the stables.
translation.ko: 우리 아빠가 사실상 이 마구간 주인이거든

translation.en: [Susie] We can show you how things really work around here.
-Take my number. We should hang out. -Oh.
Are you two still here?
[Jade] Bye, then.
-I hope you find your sister. -Wait, wait.
Uh, you know, my phone died.
-Oh. -Yeah, it does that sometimes.
Especially when people are being mean.
translation.ko: 특히 누군가 못되게 굴면 더 그래

translation.en: -I don't think I get your meaning. -No, I think you do.
Suit yourself.
Girls, would you mind staying away from my horse?
He's had such a crazy day.
Raven is your horse?
That's right, he's mine.
But don't worry,
there are plenty of other horses in the stables suitable for tourists.
translation.ko: 관광객에게 어울리는 다른 말이 마구간에 많거든

translation.en: I can send you that photo, so you have something to remember him by.
translation.ko: 레이븐을 기억할 수 있게 사진 보내줄까?

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
We'll have to go to the haystack. The Wi-Fi's strongest there.
translation.ko: 그럼 와이파이 신호가 제일 센 건초더미로 가야 해

translation.en: You guys have Wi-Fi?
-What are you doing? -Oh.
Hey, sis.
I was just texting Angela and she said that they're having a really good time.
translation.ko: 앤절라에게 문자 보냈는데 재밌게 보내고 있대

translation.en: We thought a wild horse had run off with you.
translation.ko: 야생마가 널 밟고 지나간 줄 알았잖아

translation.en: A wild horse? Get a grip, sis.
-You found her, then? -[Zoe] Yes. Now we're leaving.
Why the rush?
Hi, my name's Rosie, but you can call me Rosie.
translation.ko: 내 이름은 로즈야 로지라고 불러도 돼

translation.en: -Or just call me. -[chuckles]
Ignore her. Home. Now.
translation.ko: 얘 말은 무시해 당장 집에 가자

translation.en: -Call me. -I'll see you around.
Oh, my God. Hot Marcus totally looked at your face.
translation.ko: 세상에, 훈남 마커스가 네 얼굴을 쳐다봤어

translation.en: Don't most people look at your face when they're talking to you?
translation.ko: 원래 말할 때는 상대방 얼굴 쳐다보지 않아?

translation.en: I'd steer clear if I were you.
Mia's basically cocked her leg and peed on him.
translation.ko: 미아가 마커스를 점찍고 침 발라 놨거든

translation.en: -That's disgusting. -Excuse me.
What happened to "Home. Now"?
I'm coming.
Thank you guys so much. I'll see you later.
Wait.
Um, just wondering-- Maybe not.
You've probably got way better offers-- -She's asking for your number. -Oh.
translation.ko: - 더 좋은 제안도 받았겠지만 - 전화번호 물어보는 거야

translation.en: You told Mia your phone was dead.
Give me them digits.
Make sure you put all the sedatives back in the medical cabinet.
-Can't afford to buy more right now. -Yeah, of course.
translation.ko: - 지금은 더 살 여유가 없어 - 네, 그럴게요

translation.en: -Luckily, we didn't have to use any today. -I know. Thanks to that girl.
translation.ko: - 오늘 안 써서 다행이죠 - 그 애 덕분이야

translation.en: -Zoe. -Right.
-I still can't get over it. -I know, she was amazing.
I put Raven in the field. He was going crazy in his stable.
translation.ko: 레이븐은 사육장에 풀어놨어 마구간에서 난리를 치길래

translation.en: I'll bring him in before it gets dark. Better safe than sorry at the moment.
translation.ko: 어두워지기 전에 데려올게요 미안해도 안전이 우선이죠

translation.en: [Zoe] Mom was really worried.
[Rosie] Mom gets worried if I walk under a ladder.
[Zoe] Just because you can't get Wi-Fi, doesn't mean you can go off and disappear.
translation.ko: 와이파이가 안 잡힌다고 도망가도 되는 건 아니거든?

translation.en: You know I feel funny when I can't get online.
translation.ko: 온라인에 접속 못 하면 미칠 것 같단 말이야

translation.en: You are not a baby, Ro.
Then stop treating me like one.
Dad chose not to come with us, didn't he?
translation.ko: 아빠는 오기 싫어서 안 오신 거지?

translation.en: No, he had work. You know that.
-He's busy. -Whatever.
As soon as we get to Grandpa's, I'm Googling the Constitution.
translation.ko: 할아버지 집에 가자마자 인터넷으로 헌법을 찾아볼 거야

translation.en: [Zoe] What the...?
-What? -Nothing.
I'm wondering why you didn't use the gate. Spying, are you?
translation.ko: - 왜 이쪽으로 나오나 해서 - 스파이 짓 한 거야?

translation.en: Spying? No, I'm not spying. I'm just passing.
-I'm staying with my grandpa. -I know.
Have a look.
-What? -You obviously think I'm up to something.
So, go on. Have a look.
-No, thanks. -Suit yourself.
[Zoe] Mysterious bags and boys coming out of bushes.
translation.ko: 수수께끼 같은 가방과 덤불에서 나온 소년이라

translation.en: Ah, this place has got it all.
Looks like Frank's got guests up at the house.
translation.ko: 프랭크 할아버지가 집에 손님을 초대한 모양인데요

translation.en: -A woman and-- -The girl who brought the dark horse in.
translation.ko: - 어떤 여자분이랑... - 검은 말을 데려온 소녀?

translation.en: -There's something about her. -Ah.
-The way she handled Raven, I mean... -[sighs]
She's different.
A girl like that will break your heart given half a chance.
translation.ko: 그런 애는 기회만 있으면 네 마음을 아프게 할 거야

translation.en: -Who said I'd give her a chance? -I mean it, son.
-Leave well alone. -What's it to you?
Her family are trouble.
You think everyone's trouble.
Don't say I didn't warn you.
[Maggie] Right, that's one very grubby daughter in the bath.
-Where exactly did you find her? -The stables.
-The stables? -[Zoe] Mm-hmm. Yeah, they had Wi-Fi.
[chuckling] Poor you, having to deal with a bunch of pony princesses.
No, they weren't--
Tomorrow I'll go into the village and set Grandpa up with the Internet.
translation.ko: 내일은 마을로 가서 이 집에 인터넷을 설치할 거야

translation.en: Oh, no. I don't need you coming over here, bringing all your new-fangled LA ideas.
translation.ko: 불필요한 LA적 요소는 이곳에 필요 없어

translation.en: [laughs] It's not an LA thing. It's the whole world.
translation.ko: LA적 요소가 아니라 전 세계가 쓰는 거라고요

translation.en: -It's about time you caught up. -[sighs]
[Rosie] Mom, where's my strawberry glitter shampoo?
So, you liked the stables, then?
Yeah, yeah, I did.
[Frank] Bright Fields is a good place.
I just hope young Sam can keep it going.
translation.ko: 샘이 잘 꾸려갈 수 있으면 좋겠구나

translation.en: -Mom doesn't seem to think much of it. -[mutters]
Maggie's always been more of a city girl.
Now, where were we?
[Maggie] What are you doing up here?
This better be good. I'm about to dive into a world of knights and ghosts and--
translation.ko: 왜요? 지금 제가 빠져들려는 세계는 기사와 유령...

translation.en: Vampire cats?
Myths and Legends.
I used to love that book when I was your age.
translation.ko: 내가 너만 했을 때 그 책을 좋아했었지

translation.en: I wanted to say thank you for today.
You've been a star.
-I'm sorry for being such a-- -Massively overprotective drama queen?
I was gonna go with "concerned mom."
Having Rosie to chase round the island will give you something to do this summer.
Mm, right after I come up with new and interesting ways to lie about Dad.
translation.ko: 아빠에 대해 거짓말하는 방법 찾는 일로도 바쁘겠죠

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Mom-- -It's okay.
Your dad and I just need a bit of time apart to figure out...
translation.ko: 네 아빠랑 나는 잠시 떨어져서 생각할 시간이 필요해

translation.en: where we're going wrong.
Yeah. Yeah.
Enjoy the book.
Thank you.
[Zoe] And now, finally, the total peace and quiet can begin.
translation.ko: 이제 드디어 완벽한 평화와 고요함을 즐길 수 있겠어

translation.en: No more panicking moms, no more lost sisters,
translation.ko: 겁에 질린 엄마도 사라진 동생도 없고

translation.en: and no more dangerous wild horses.
[Zoe] I said, no more wild horses.
[Zoe] Check me out, totally resisting.
translation.ko: 나 좀 봐 잘 참고 있어

translation.en: Nope, mnh-mnh, not interested.
[Zoe] Ah... who am I kidding?
Hey.
Hey.
Hey, boy. Hey.
I just wanted to come and say good night.
We're famous.
Hey. What's wrong?
Is someone there?
Hey.
Tch. It's okay. It's just you and me.
There's nothing to be scared of.
I promise.
